channel.title: music on D00k
channel.description: Recent content in music on D00k

item.title: Leaving Spotify for Freer Pastures
item.description: Over the past year, I’ve slowly worked on moving my listening activities away from Spotify and towards a setup where I have much more control over how I listen. As people will be checking out their Spotify Unwrapped, I thought it’d be a great time to talk about my thoughts on the platform and why I’m moving away from it. Why leave? Don’t get me wrong, Spotify is pretty great. Being able to listen to just about whatever I want, whenever I want and in decent quality is a great privilege.

item.title: Now
item.description: March 2023 ∘ Working on my new iPod theme, Themify. ∘ Writing the second draft of my Rockbox Theming Book. ∘ Learning Python and GTK, making a Dice Rolling app. What’s Playing? ∘ Currently reading 'Busy Doing Nothing' by Devine and Rekka. ∘ Listening to Valentine by Snail Mail. ∘ Listening to Here Comes the Cowboy by Mac DeMarco. Further Reading ∙ Projects TODO List. ∙ Now 2023.
